properties.entry: SELECT NOTICE_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, (TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) A, (TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) B, COUNT FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO

SELECT NOTICE_NO, CATEGORY_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, (TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) A, (TO_CHAR(MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS')) B, COUNT FROM TB_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET ( NOTICE_TITLE = ?, NOTICE_CONTENT = ? ) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE TB_NOTICE SET ( STATUS = 'N' ) WHERE NOTICE_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
